nodes.text: Liberty for All was a propaganda poster used by the Alliance to Restore the Republic. It depicted a stormtrooper faded in a red background, six Wookiees cuffed together in a line, Wookiee arms breaking his binders, as well as the words "Liberty! For All" on the main portion in High Galactic, with the "For" having its "o" being stylized to bear the Rebel Starbird, and "All" being written from the shattered chains from the broken binders. At the bottom was the words "Help Make It a Reality", also written in High Galactic. The words "Liberty!", "All", and "Reality" are written in some variation of white, while the words "For" and "Help Make It A" are written orange.
